videooutput: Can be selected from NTSC and PAL
exposurecontrol: Programmed auto exposure and exposure compensation (-2.0 -  2.0 EV in steps of 1/3 EV)
weight: Approx. 125 g (4.5 oz) (with battery and SD memory card)
chargingtime: Approx. 2 h 30 min (when using Charging AC Adapter EH-70P and when no charge remains)
producttitle: Nikon CoolPix S2700 (16 Megapixel, Compact Digital Camera, Black)
monitor: 6.7 cm (2.7-in.), approx. 230k-dot, TFT LCD, and 5-level brightness adjustment
powersources: One Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EN-EL19 (included) AC Adapter EH-62G (available separately)
selftimer: Can be selected from 10 and 2 second durations
dimensionswxhxd: Approx. 94.8 x 57.8 x 20.8 mm (3.8 x 2.3 x 0.9 in.) (excluding projections)
exposuremeteringmode: 256-segment matrix, center-weighted (digital zoom less than 2x), spot (digital zoom 2x or more)
flashcontrol: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
storagemedia: Internal memory (approx. 42 MB) SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card
shutterspeed: 1/2000-1 s 4 s (when scene mode is set to Fireworks show)
lensfocallength: 4.6-27.6 mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 26-156 mm lens in 35 mm [135] format)
focusareaselection: Face priority, auto (9-area automatic selection), center, manual with 99 focus areas, subject tracking
framecoverageplaybackmode: Approx. 100% horizontal and 100% vertical (compared to actual image)
imagesensor: 1/2.3-in. type CCD; approx. 16.44 million total pixels
digitalzoommagnification: Up to 4x (angle of view equivalent to that of approx. 624 mm lens in 35 mm [135] format)
framecoverageshootingmode: Approx. 98% horizontal and 98% vertical (compared to actual image)
isosensitivitystandardoutputsensitivity: ISO 80-1600 ISO 3200 (available when using Auto mode)
